because there's no connection to database which is necessary in GB007; removed
06.07.2007 LB Call Change PWD in case expired
02.05.2006 CO SCR11101 Made Ok-buttin the default button

10.01.2006 LB. This program is a prototype for SSO implementation
In order to get it working properly the MSG keyword in the easycom.ini file has
If there is no connection call the online program
If not connected Exit after 3 times

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Logon failed: Invalid user-ID or password. After 3 failed logons the user-ID is blocked')
